23-062EC.summary: Recommendation to receive and file a report from the Ad Hoc Committees; discuss anticipated Ad Hoc Committees for upcoming projects; and, if appropriate, take action to dissolve or create Ad Hoc Committees. Chair Morales spoke.Commissioner De Benedictis spoke.A motion was made by Commissioner Añorve, seconded by Commissioner Fiedler, to approve recommendation.
